column4: i have just installed xubuntu on my desktop, and went to youtube, it told me to install the flash plugins and so i did, but now when i goto youtube and select a video and try to watch it, the video area just stays black and doesnt change...
u may need some other packages
tell me what flash it says ur using
yeah you need to remove swf stuff use synaptics an look for swf
u are updated but u need to remove the old one
synaptics package manager like i said
the swf is blocking the use of the newer flash stuff
but check after u remove it using that site
we are up to version 10.x.x.x of flash now
if u go to systemdetails.com it can tell u if it worked:p
what flash are u using now according to the website?
go to youtube and test then

synaptics package manager is way easier to use than the way windows does it, you dont have to find and download installers run them etc, its all in one place? u dont need to use terminal too much like uu use command prompt?
